name: steak
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A2 a thick, flat piece of meat or fish, especially meat from a cow: T-bone/sirloin steaks salmon/turkey steaks Shall we have steak for dinner?
a thick, flat piece of a vegetable such as cauliflower, or large mushrooms, cooked like a steak: The mains include hearty cauliflower steaks with roasted red peppers and salsa. Mushroom steaks make a fitting part of a winter vegetarian feast.
